reviewText: a beatiful story a fabula about the down syndrome.
Great movie. Anyone who has a child or knows anyone with downs highly recommend
What the heck! How did I miss the fact that this is in French only without English subtitles?

I looked for this movie for many years, until I got it here on Amazon. This film is completely emotional, teaches you to see life differently and appreciate all you have now. But mostly to understand people with down syndrome. 100% recommended.
I thought the dvd would not arrive on time, but it was worth it. A major masterpiece telling that we should wonder what "being normal"  really means and that the actual disease is called prejudice.

I was told about this movie from a family member from Mexico.  When I was finally able to see it, I cried and cried.  It is an excellent movie, it touches your heart.  I have a sister with Down Syndrome and this made me aware of the possibilities of when she becomes an adult.  Great movie for anyone to see!
